data.title: About Us
data.meta_description: Since 1988, Techtron Environmental Solutions has been helping homeowners, property managers, contractors and government agencies with environmental safety services.
data.meta_site_name: - Techtron Environmental Solutions is the midwest leader in fast and accurate environmental mobile lab testing.
data.text:
Our environmental laboratory has been in operation since 1988. We are proud to have an ISO:17025 accredited lab and AIHA-proficient analysts.

All our asbestos, mold, lead testing and analysis can be accomplished via our traditional lab services, or through our mobile lab network, which is the only network of its kind that exists in our industry in the United States. Our network of mobile brings state-of-the-art equipment and fully qualified, certified Industrial Hygienists, right to your doorstep. This offers our customers the industryâ€™s best environmental expertise and speedy turnaround times (WITHIN HOURS), regardless of your geographical location. We will work directly with you to collect samples, analyze them, and provide you lab reports and recommendations so you can accurately and reliable address and mitigate hazardous conditions to protect your projects, staff, clients, and family.
